defaultOpen.description: The open state of the popover when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 弹出框最初呈现时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

open.description: The controlled open state of the popover. Can be binded with v-model.
open.description_zh: 弹出框的受控打开状态。可与v-model绑定。

modal.description: The modality of the popover. When set to true, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only popover content will be visible to screen readers.
modal.description_zh: 弹出框的模式。设置为 true 时，将禁用与外部元素的交互，并且屏幕阅读器只能看到弹出窗口内容。
